title: The Stable door
creator_credit: Pat Jackson, Ronald H. Riley and Ronald H Riley and Associates
brief_description: While a gang plan to rob a warehouse, an insurance company tries to persuade the owners of the warehouse to improve their security arrangements. The result proves the value of precautions, which apply equally in the home, office or factory.
creator_credit_for_label: Pat Jackson, Ronald H. Riley and Ronald H Riley and Associates
